articles.author: IANS
articles.title: Bangladesh: Dengue death toll exceeds 300, caseload nears 64,000 this year - The New Indian Express
articles.description: The South Asian country experienced its highest spike in dengue cases last month, with 43,854 new infections and 204 deaths.
articles.content: DHAKA: Bangladesh reported 10 more deaths and 2,495 dengue cases in the past 24 hours, pushing the death toll to 303 and the total number of infections to 63,968, Directorate General of Health Servic… [+957 chars]
